text: New Roads (historically ) is the parish seat of Pointe Coupee Parish, Louisiana, United States. The population was 4,549 at the 2020 census. The city's ZIP code is 70760. It is part of the Baton Rouge Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==References== Category:Parish seats in Louisiana Category:Cities in Louisiana Category:Settlements in Pointe Coupee Parish, Louisiana
title: New Roads, Louisiana
